publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2817 Richard Lochhead: Labour Administration of Aberdeen City Council-That the Parliament condemns Aberdeen City Council's Labour administration for its flagrant disregard of the citizens of the city by voting to (a) allow the Lord Provost to continue to take a friend on overseas trips, (b) close the Grandholm Bridge, which will once again bring gridlock to the city and (c) abolish the meals-on-wheels service and replace it with a fortnightly frozen food delivery and, in light of these contemptuous actions, calls on the council's Labour administration to resign immediately.

S1M-2817 Labour Administration of Aberdeen City Council (lodged on 1 March 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Shona Robison*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*, Andrew Wilson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-2817 Labour Administration of Aberdeen City Council (lodged on 1 March 2002) Tricia Marwick*, Michael Matheson*, Linda Fabiani*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-2817 Labour Administration of Aberdeen City Council (lodged on 1 March 2002) Brian Adam*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2817 Labour Administration of Aberdeen City Council (lodged on 1 March 2002) Colin Campbell*
